ISSUE.TITLE: CanPrepareRobotsTextFile test fails after disallowing AJAX routes for crawling
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70.5 Steps to reproduce the problem: The CanPrepareRobotsTextFile test fails after changes introduced in https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/commit/d4416596f0f3faba4ddc11a6be7d087b71d783ea See also https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/7286#issuecomment-2345417718

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7328 Fixed inline editing of decimal numbers with leading zero in fraction
